title: Advanced Quantification of Uncertainties In Fusion modelling at the Exascale with model order Reduction (AQUIFER)
summary: This document discusses the activities, events, and progress of the AQUIFER project, which focuses on Advanced Quantification of Uncertainties In Fusion modelling at the Exascale with model order Reduction. The project includes a Functional Emulation for temperature profile: Reduced Order Modelling study case.
